pr_title: reduce the stack traces produced when shutting down.

timeline.message:
reduce the stack traces produced when shutting down.

Signed-off-by: Paul Harris <paul.harris@consensys.net>

timeline.bodyText: its super common to get exceptions here, and they're never anything other than InterruptedException, and the root cause doesn't seem to be set ,so i've reduced this to debug level.
timeline.author: rolfyone
